official_title: A PHASE 2, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND, PLACEBO-CONTROLLED STUDY TO INVESTIGATE THE EFFICACY, SAFETY AND TOLERABILITY OF PONSEGROMAB IN PATIENTS WITH CANCER, CACHEXIA, AND ELEVATED CONCENTRATIONS OF GDF-15, FOLLOWED BY AN OPTIONAL OPEN-LABEL TREATMENT PERIOD (PROACC -1)
